description: Infusions are not class abilities, you must find them or learn them from other people.
name: infusions

talents.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
talents.info_text: Activate the infusion to heal yourself for 0 life over 0 turns.
talents.name: Infusion: Regeneration

talents.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
talents.info_text: Activate the infusion to heal yourself for 0 life.
talents.name: Infusion: Healing

talents.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
talents.info_text: Activate the infusion to cure yourself of physical, mental, or magical effects and reduce all damage taken by 0% for 0 turns.
talents.name: Infusion: Wild

talents.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
talents.info_text:
Activate the infusion to increase movement speed by 0% for 1 game turn.

Any actions other than movement will cancel the effect.

Also prevent stuns, dazes and pinning effects for 0 turns.

Note: since you will be moving very fast, game turns will pass very slowly.
talents.name: Infusion: Movement

talents.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
talents.info_text:
Activate the infusion to brighten the area in a radius of 0 and illuminate stealthy creatures, possibly revealing them (reduces stealth power by 0).

It will also blind any creatures caught inside (power 0) for 0 turns.
talents.name: Infusion: Sun

talents.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
talents.info_text:
Activate the infusion to increase three of your primary stats by 0 for 0 turns.

Also while Heroism is active, you will only die when reaching -0 life. However, when below 0 you cannot see how much life you have left.

It will always increase your three highest stats.
talents.name: Infusion: Heroism

talents.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
talents.info_text:
Activate the infusion to spit a bolt of poison doing 0.00 nature damage per turns for 7 turns, and reducing the target's healing received by 0%.

The sudden stream of natural forces also strips you of one random detrimental magical effect.
talents.name: Infusion: Insidious Poison

talents.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
talents.info_text:
Causes thick vines to spring from the ground and entangle all targets within 5 squares for 0 turns, pinning them in place and dealing 15, 33, 63, 93, 123 physical damage and 31, 67, 127, 187, 247 nature damage.

The vines also grow all around you, increasing your armour by 50 and armour hardiness by 30.
talents.name: Infusion: Wild Growth

description: Runes are not class abilities, you must find them or learn them from other people.
name: runes

talents.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
talents.info_text:
Activate the rune to teleport randomly in a range of 0.

Afterwards you stay out of phase for 0 turns. In this state all new negative status effects duration is reduced by 0%, your defense is increased by 0 and all your resistances by 0%.
talents.name: Rune: Phase Door

talents.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
talents.info_text: Activate the rune to teleport in a range of 0.
talents.name: Rune: Controlled Phase Door

talents.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
talents.info_text: Activate the rune to teleport randomly in a range of 0 with a minimum range of 15.
talents.name: Rune: Teleportation

talents.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
talents.info_text: Activate the rune to create a protective shield absorbing at most 0 damage for 0 turns.
talents.name: Rune: Shielding

talents.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
talents.info_text:
Activate the rune to create a protective shield absorbing and reflecting at most 115, 137, 175, 212, 250 damage for 5 turns.

The effect will scale with your magic stat.
talents.name: Rune: Reflection Shield

talents.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
talents.info_text:
Activate the rune to become invisible (power 0) for 0 turns.

As you become invisible you fade out of phase with reality, all your damage is reduced by 40%.
talents.name: Rune: Invisibility

talents.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
talents.info_text: Activate the rune to increase your global speed by 0% for 0 turns.
talents.name: Rune: Speed

talents.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
talents.info_text:
Activate the rune to get a vision of the area surrounding you (0 radius) and to allow you to see invisible and stealthed creatures (power 0) for 0 turns.

Your mind will become more receptive for 0 turns, allowing you to sense any humanoid around.
talents.name: Rune: Vision

talents.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
talents.info_text:
Activate the rune to fire a beam of heat, doing 0.00 fire damage over 5 turns

The intensity of the heat will also remove one random detrimental physical effect from you.
talents.name: Rune: Heat Beam

talents.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
talents.info_text:
Activate the rune to fire a bolt of ice, doing 0.00 cold damage with a chance to freeze the target.

The deep cold also crystalizes your mind, removing one random detrimental mental effect from you.
talents.name: Rune: Frozen Spear

talents.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
talents.info_text:
Activate the rune to fire a self-centered acid wave of radius 0, doing 0.00 acid damage.

The corrosive acid will also reduce accuracy, defense and armour by 15 for 0 turns.
talents.name: Rune: Acid Wave

talents.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
talents.info_text:
Activate the rune to fire a beam of lightning, doing 0.00 to 0.00 lightning damage.

Also transform you into pure lightning for 2 turns; any damage will teleport you to an adjacent tile and ignore the damage (can only happen once per turn)
talents.name: Rune: Lightning

talents.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
talents.info_text:
Activate the rune to unleash a manasurge upon yourself, increasing mana regeneration by 0% over 0 turns and instantly restoring 0 mana.

Also when resting your mana will regenerate at 0.5 per turn.
talents.name: Rune: Manasurge

talents.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
talents.info_text:
Inflicts 190, 250, 350, 450, 550 temporal damage. If your target survives, it will be sent 4 turns into the future.

It will also lower your paradox by 60 (if you have any).

Note that messing with the spacetime continuum may have unforeseen consequences.
talents.name: Rune of the Rift

description: Taints are not class abilities, you must find them or learn them from other people.
name: taints

talents.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
talents.info_text: Activate the taint on a foe, removing 0 effects from it and healing you for 0 for each effect.
talents.name: Taint: Devourer

talents.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
talents.info_text: Strip the protective barriers from your mind for 0 turns, allowing in the thoughts all creatures within 10 squares but reducing mind save by 10 and increasing your mindpower by 35 for 10 turns.
talents.name: Taint: Telepathy
